mapping between the input and output data , has been widely used in engineering field .', 'Researcher have applied machine learning model to generate 2D drawing with pixel or 3D model with voxels , but the pixelization reduces the precision of the geometry .', 'Therefore , in order to learn and generate 3D geometry as vectorized model with higher precision and faster computation speed , we develop a specific artificial neural network , learning and generating design feature for the form of building .', 'A customized data structure with feature parameter is constructed , meeting the requirement of the neural network by rebuilding surface with controlling point and appending additional input neuron as quantified vector to describe the property of the design .', 'The neural network is first trained with generated design data and then tested by adjusting the feature parameter .', 'The prediction of the generated data shows the basic generative ability of the neural network .', 'Furthermore , trained with design data collected from existing building , the neural network learns and infers the geometric design feature of architectural design with different feature parameter , providing a data-driven method for designer to generate and analyze architectural form .', 'Meta-regression framework for energy consumption prediction in a smart city : A case study of Songdo in South Korea .', 'Nowadays the concept of smart city has gained in popularity in urban study .', 'A smart city collects diverse information to monitor and analyze urban system , such as energy management .', 'It is crucial for smart city to monitor energy efficiency to be sustainable .', 'In this study , we search to expose the possibility offered by the energy data of Songdo , a South Korean smart city .', 'First , we have highlighted the ability of Songdo to generate energy data .', 'Second , we used those data to predict its evolution .', 'As a result , we develop a short-term stacking ensemble model for energy consumption in Songdo , focusing on a three-months-ahead prediction problem .', 'To obtain this result , first we design a baseline regressors for the prediction , second , we apply a three-combination of each best model of the base regressors , and finally , a weighted meta-regression model was applied using meta-XGBoost .', 'We call the resulting model stacking ensemble model .', 'The proposed stacking ensemble model combines the best ensemble network to improve performance prediction , yielding an R2 value of 97.89 % .', 'The result support the effectiveness of the ensemble network , which use Artificial Neural Networks ( ANN ) , CatBoost and Gradient Boosting .', 'This study also shows that the weighted meta model outperforms several machine learning model in term of R2 , MAE and RSME .', 'Investigation of urban climate and built environment relation by using machine learning .', 'Climate change can cause a cascade of effect from the individual organism to ecosystem-scale where in nature , all specie are element of complex network of interaction .', 'Hence , every impact on every scale has a significant role .', 'Those property of the network are decisive on the global ecosystem , so how they will be modified by climate change needs serious study .', 'The vast population of the urban area exerts significant effect on climate change even though they cover a small proportion of the surface of the Earth ; however , impact of urbanization on climate and ecosystems remain inadequately understood .', 'In the meantime , urbanization continues to increase and in 2030 , two-thirds of the population is expected to be living in urban area with an increasing rate in time .', 'It is of great importance to elaborate on the relation between urbanization and climate .', 'In this respect , the use of information technology with an extensive computational capacity is one of the cornerstone of climate and urban study .', 'Machine learning is a branch of computer science that deal with the automated recognition of pattern from data .', 'The use of machine learning algorithm can bring significant advantage to both understanding and predicting the climate .', 'The computational power with big data , their ability to capture nonlinear behavior , and learn as new data arrive make machine learning a useful tool for understanding climate and developing urban planning .', 'In this sense , the purpose of this study is to show the advantage of machine learning algorithm by developing a recurrent neural network algorithm to make climate prediction and stating possible effect of machine learning on design and its contribution to understanding the climate .', '4D building reconstruction with machine learning and historical map .', 'The increasing importance of three-dimensional ( 3D ) city modelling is linked to these data ’ s different application and advantage in many domain .', 'Image and Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) data availability are now an evident and unavoidable prerequisite , not always verified for past scenario .', 'Indeed , historical map are often the only source of information when dealing with historical scenario or multi-temporal ( 4D ) digital representation .', 'The paper presents a methodology to derive 4D building model in the level of detail 1 ( LoD1 ) , inferring missing height information through machine learning technique .', 'The aim is to realise 4D LoD1 building for geospatial analysis and visualisation , valorising historical data , and urban study .', 'Several machine learning regression technique are analysed and employed for deriving missing height data from digitised multi-temporal map .', 'The implemented method relies on geometric , neighbour , and categorical attribute for height prediction .', 'Derived elevation data are then used for 4D building reconstruction , offering multitemporal version of the considered urban scenario .', 'Various evaluation metric are also presented for tackling the common issue of lack of ground-truth information within historical data .', 'Measuring sustainability and urban data operationalization : An integrated computational framework to evaluate and interpret the performance of the urban form .', 'With rapid urbanization , the necessity for sustainable development has skyrocketed , and sustainable urban development is a must .', 'Recent advance in computing performance of urban layout in real-time allow for new paradigms of performance-driven design .', 'As beneficial as utilizing multiple layer of urban data may be , it can also create a challenge in interpreting and operationalizing data .', "This paper presents an integrated computational framework to measure sustainability , operationalize and interpret the urban form 's performance data using generative design method , novel performance simulation , and machine learning prediction .", 'The performance data is clustered into three pillar of sustainability : social , environmental , and economical , and it is followed with the performance space exploration , which assists in extracting knowledge and actionable rule of thumb .', 'A significant advantage of the framework is that it can be used as a discussion table in participatory planning processes since it could be easily adapted to interactive environment .', 'A data-driven approach for multi-scale GIS-based building energy modeling for analysis , planning and support decision making .', 'Urban planner , local authority , and energy policymakers often develop strategic sustainable energy plan for the urban building stock in order to minimize overall energy consumption and emission .', 'Planning at such scale could be informed by building stock modeling using existing building data and Geographic Information System-based mapping .', 'However , implementing these process involves several issue , namely , data availability , data inconsistency , data scalability , data integration , geocoding , and data privacy .', 'This research addresses the aforementioned information challenge by proposing a generalized integrated methodology that implements bottom-up , data-driven , and spatial modeling approach for multi-scale Geographic Information System mapping of building energy modeling .', 'This study uses the Irish building stock to map building energy performance at multiple scale .', 'The generalized data-driven methodology uses approximately 650,000 Irish Energy Performance Certificates building data to predict more than 2 million building ’ energy performance .', 'In this case , the approach delivers a prediction accuracy of 88 % using deep learning algorithms .', 'These prediction result are then used for spatial modeling at multiple scale from the individual building level to a national level .', 'Furthermore , these map are coupled with available spatial resource ( social , economic , or environmental data ) for energy planning , analysis , and support decision-making .', 'The modeling result identify cluster of building that have a significant potential for energy saving within any specific region .', 'Geographic Information System-based modeling aid stakeholder in identifying priority area for implementing energy efficiency measure .', 'Furthermore , the stakeholder could target local community for retrofit campaign , which would enhance the implementation of sustainable energy policy decision .', 'Resilient structural system created by research .', 'Research is essential for developing new idea creating resilient structure that have extended and predicted life cycle .', 'Through creative use of material , construction technique , and building performance , this research can address broad issue related to the life of structure starting with urban planning and ending with health monitoring .', 'Awareness is key to solving complex issue and the collaboration between academic study , research , and practice is critical .', 'This paper will focus on how research has manifested new approach to design .', 'Example include the use of mechanized approach to design , optimization theory and machine learning .', 'Idea range from component in building to entire city and the work includes project from various place around the world .', 'Intelligent Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Technology in Urban Environments .', 'Sustainable development of megacities requires a transition to the new management method and technology , based on the wide use of a large amount of heterogeneous data .', 'Managing the urban economy needs to consider environmental restriction , environmental monitoring task , engineering facility , and transport .', 'Operational control over the urban environment and the surrounding area can be produced using unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAVs ) , and the collected data can be processed using a wide range of software and hardware technology related to the field of artificial intelligence .', 'However , along with any fairly new technology , intelligent unmanned technology have both advantage and disadvantage .', 'Strength are mobility and efficiency , relative cheapness , the possibility of a high degree of automation , whereas weakness are short flight time , dependence on weather condition , the certain outstanding task of data management and processing .', 'This paper considers the possibility of using intelligent unmanned technology based on UAVs for solving the problem of monitoring the urban environment of the Kazakhstan megalopolis .', 'Consideration is also being given to the scope for extending possibility of applying these technology to the field of environmental monitoring , monitoring of hazardous geological process , technical construction and vehicle .', 'Furthermore , technological and economic issue , as well as necessary data processing technology , are discussed .', 'The economic effect of the use of IUVAT is estimated at $ 70-200 million , but it requires solving a set of data processing , control and technical problem .', 'Building Energy Information : Demand and Consumption Prediction with Machine Learning Models for Sustainable and Smart Cities .', 'Building energy consumption plays an essential role in urban sustainability .', 'The prediction of the energy demand is also of particular importance for developing smart city and urban planning .', 'Machine learning has recently contributed to the advancement of method and technology to predict demand and consumption for building energy system .', 'This paper presents a state of the art of machine learning model and evaluates the performance of these model .', 'Through a systematic review and a comprehensive taxonomy , the advance of machine learning are carefully investigated and promising model are introduced .', 'Rapid and automated urban modeling technique for UAS application .', 'Urban model for testing UAV path-planning algorithms commonly apply simple representation using cuboid or cylinderical shape which may not capture the characteristic of a urban environment .', 'To address this limitation of existing urban model , this paper presents two urban modeling technique for an unmanned aircraft flight simulation in an urban environment .', 'The first proposed urban modeling technique is an airborne LiDAR source-based approach that incorporates machine learning algorithm to identify the number of building and characterize them from the LiDAR information .', 'The second proposed urban modeling technique is an artificial urban modeling technique without any airborne LiDAR resource that applies an adaptive spacing method , an iterative algorithm to define an artificial urban environment .', 'Unlike the LiDAR source-based approach that creates an approximated urban model , the adaptive spacing-based urban modeling algorithm generates an artificial urban environment that is visually different from a reference city , but has similar the characteristic to it .', 'To demonstrate the two proposed urban modeling technique , numerical simulation are conducted using open-source datasets to construct several realistic urban model .', 'A multiscale clustering of the urban morphology for use in quantitative model .', 'Geo-spatial data available to researcher and practitioner has increased substantially over the last decade , offering new opportunity for analyzing and characterizing location and their spatial environment in an objective way .', 'Various study in the field of urban planning and design have given recommendation on “ good urban form ” , suggesting that especially characteristic of the urban morphology inform the quality of location and additionally influence spatial behavior .', 'While we find a growing number of quantitative spatial model such as hedonic price model , location choice model , or applied machine learning algorithm , characteristic describing the urban morphology are still rarely reported in these .', 'One reason can be found in the limited knowledge on how to characterize the urban morphology best .', 'In this chapter , we address this deficit and define attribute that are suitable to characterize the urban morphology in quantitative mean at different scale .', 'We show how these can be processed from a data model that is simple enough to allow for reproducibility in most study area and process them for the case study of Switzerland .', 'Finally , we use the attribute to define urban typology through clustering method .', 'These are compared on their outcome , their consistency , and interpretation .', 'Comparison of Regression Tools for Regional Electric Load Forecasting .', 'Urban area electrical load forecasting is important for power generation capacity planning and also to integrate environment friendly energy source at district level .', 'Load prediction will help in developing demand side management in coordination with renewable power generation .', 'Urban area load is influenced by meteorological condition therefore it is important to include weather parameter for load prediction .', 'Machine Learning algorithm can effectively contribute for electrical load prediction .', 'The most commonly used algorithm for load prediction is Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ) , which is a complex predictor that utilizes a big amount of training data .', 'k-Nearest Neighbour ( kNN ) has proven to be efficient by the introduction of binary dummy variable for categorisation and it can be used for short term ( 30 min ) and long term ( 24 hour ) load forecasting .', 'This paper explores the use of regression tool for regional electric load forecasting by correlating lower distinctive categorical level ( season and day of the week ) and weather parameter .', 'The historical electrical load datasets with meteorological parameter are available for the Sydney region and they have been used to test the regression tool .', 'Data correlation over seasonal change have been argued by mean of improving Mean Absolute Percentage Error ( MAPE ) .', 'By examining the structure of various regressors they are compared for the lowest MAPE .', 'The regressors show good MAPE for short term ( 30 min ) prediction and Random Forest Regressor scores best in the range of 1-2 % MAPE .']
